manifesto.title: We transform your fleet into a secure and profitable asset.
manifesto.description: Beyond simple GPS tracking, AI-Karangué combines IoT and artificial intelligence to protect your drivers, reduce your costs, and secure your passengers — in real time.

products.name: The Expert's Eye
products.target: For managers concerned about their civil liability and their teams' health.
products.description: Take back control over the unpredictable. This advanced visual detection module acts as a tireless second pair of eyes, identifying human risks before they become costly statistics.
features: Precise identification of the assigned driver

products.name: The Active Sentinel
products.target: Ideal for securing your most valuable assets and reducing your insurance premiums.
products.description: Transform your vehicles into intelligent fortresses. The Sentinel anticipates collisions and lane departures, offering your operation unprecedented margin for maneuver against road hazards.
features: Lane Departure Warning without turn signal (LDW)

products.name: The Capital Witness
products.target: The ultimate legal protection tool for managers in case of disputes.
products.description: Leave no room for doubt. Document every critical second with surgical precision. Total visibility, inside and out, synchronized directly with your management cockpit.
features: Automatic recording on impact or braking

software.bottomHook: The system handles 100% of alerts. You only manage exceptions.

features.title: Absolute Control
features.description: A bird's eye view of every movement. No more blind spots in your operations, from Dakar to Tambacounda.

features.title: Irrefutable Proof
features.description: In case of dispute, you have the footage. Defuse conflicts and protect your drivers instantly.

tripleImpact.sectionDescription: Because a high-performing fleet relies on the perfect balance between safety, profitability, and customer satisfaction.

pillars.title: For Your Drivers
pillars.subtitle: Safety & Support
pillars.description: They're not machines. Our AI protects them like a caring co-pilot, reducing stress and accident risks.

pillars.title: For Your Managers
pillars.subtitle: Serenity & Control
pillars.description: Run your operation with no blind spots. Transform every kilometer into actionable data to maximize profitability.

pillars.title: For Your Passengers
pillars.subtitle: Trust & Comfort
pillars.description: The guarantee of a safe journey. A secure fleet is your best asset for retaining demanding customers.

roiCalculator.sectionDescription: Measure the direct financial impact of digitalizing your fleet. Results based on real-world performance.

labels.emailDisclaimer: By clicking send, you agree to receive a personalized study based on these figures.

offres.sectionDescription: Clear options, no hidden costs. Choose the level of control that matches your ambitions.

hero.label: Industry Solutions
hero.title: Tailored
hero.description: Every industry has its rules, risks, and opportunities. We've designed native solutions for each of them.

sectors.title: Public
sectors.description: Optimize every trip. Our solution reduces your operational costs and drastically decreases accident risks through AI.

sectors.title: Logistics
sectors.description: Fuel is your largest expense. Our high-precision connected probes give you total control over every drop.

sectors.title: Construction &
sectors.description: Extreme environments demand robust solutions. Site geofencing, engine activity tracking, and preventive maintenance.

sectors.title: VIP
sectors.description: Excellence doesn't wait. Guarantee impeccable service with total confidentiality and Swiss punctuality.

sectors.title: Car
sectors.description: Protect your assets against theft and non-payment. Remote immobilization and precise tracking for stress-free fleet management.

finalCta.title: Your industry has its challenges.
finalCta.description: Don't let the unknown manage your operations. Take control with AI-Karangué.

hero.description: Clear options, no hidden costs. Choose the level of control that matches your ambitions.

comparison.title: Detailed
comparison.description: A comprehensive view to make the right choice.

support.title: Dedicated 24/7 Platinum Support.
support.description: No frustrating chatbots. A team of engineers based in Dakar, ready to intervene on-site or remotely in less than 2 hours.
support.label: Local Team

installation.title: Express Installation
installation.description: Deployment of 50+ vehicles in less than a week. Our technicians come to you, anywhere in Senegal.

updates.title: OTA Updates
updates.description: Your system improves over time. Remote software updates included in all packages.

training.title: Ongoing Training Included
training.description: We train your managers and drivers on optimal use of Karangué221 to guarantee immediate ROI.

finalCta.title: Have doubts?
finalCta.description: Request a free analysis of your fleet and discover how much you can save from the first month.

value.sectionDescription: Fleet managers lose an average of

cards.title: Save Lives
cards.problemHighlight: Preventable accidents, undetected fatigue, invisible risky behaviors.

cards.title: Save Time
cards.problemHighlight: Manual management, Excel reports, information search, wasted time.

capabilities.sectionDescription: Karangué221 centralizes all your fleet operations in an intuitive and powerful interface.

hardware.sectionDescription: Discover our three Teltonika technological pillars natively integrated into Karangué221 for absolute security.

items.label: Driver Monitoring
items.title: DSM
items.description: An artificial intelligence system that scans the driver's face in real time to detect signs of fatigue and distractions.

items.label: Road Assistance
items.title: ADAS
items.description: A smart camera that reads the road ahead of the vehicle. It anticipates dangers and alerts the driver via the Driving Coach before impact.

items.label: Video Evidence
items.title: DualCam
items.description: A dual-lens connected system that simultaneously films the road and the cabin. Incident sequences are automatically sent to the Karangué221 cloud.

platformDetail.sectionDescription: No more multiple platforms. Find tracking, video, and performance analysis in the same place.

tracking.title: Total Visibility
tracking.description: Track your vehicles in real time on a smooth interactive map. Trip history, stops, and engine status at a glance.

dashboard.title: Data-Driven Decisions
dashboard.description: Transform your raw data into concrete actions. Consumption reports, eco-driving scores, and predictive maintenance.

video.title: Video on Demand
video.description: Access cameras live or relive past incidents. Instantly downloadable HD evidence.

geofencing.title: Intelligent Geofencing
geofencing.description: Define authorized zones (depots, customers) or prohibited areas. Be instantly alerted by email/SMS.

finalCta.title: Ready to transform
finalCta.description: Join the managers who have chosen operational serenity with Karangué221.

hero.label: GET IN TOUCH
hero.title: Let's transform your fleet together.
hero.description: Our experts are ready to analyze your needs and design a tailor-made solution for your business.

form.description: Fill out this form and our team will contact you within 24 hours.

footer.mission: Building the future of road safety.
footer.description: AI-Karangué is a premium solution published by Art'Beau-Rescence S.A.S., merging computer vision and cutting-edge telematics.

hero.label: MOBILE LOGISTICS
hero.title:
Fleet Tracking &
Delivery Performance
hero.description: The alliance of mobile technology and Cloud control for cutting-edge, secure, and transparent logistics.

sama.title: Sama Karangué: Mobile Intelligence for Your Drivers
sama.description: Installed on your drivers' smartphones, it provides your staff with interactive and secure tools for smooth and transparent delivery execution.

items.title: Precision GPS Location
items.description: Each smartphone becomes an advanced GPS tracker, transmitting position, speed, and route in real-time.

items.title: Secure Chat
items.description: Seamless coordination between drivers and dispatchers with exchange of messages, photos, and QR codes.

items.title: Emergency SOS Button
items.description: Quick sending of alarm messages and automatic calling of help in critical situations.

items.title: Proof of Delivery
items.description: Scan QR codes and send timestamped, geolocated photos for irrefutable traceability.

items.title: Real-time Status
items.description: Immediate update of availability (Available, In Delivery, On Break).

items.title: Black Box
items.description: Local data storage for up to 30 days in case of internet connection loss.

karangue221.title: Karangué221: The Intelligent Supervision Platform
karangue221.description: Your command center for effortless delivery fleet management. A full suite of tools for supervision, analysis, and optimization.

features.title: Real-time Tracking
features.description: Visualize the exact position of each driver on a detailed interactive map.

features.title: Advanced Geofencing
features.description: Create custom zones and receive instant alerts upon entry and exit.

features.title: Intelligent Notifications
features.description: Automatic alerts for speeding, low battery, or SOS messages.

features.title: Detailed Analytics
features.description: Comprehensive reports on routes, eco-driving, and personnel performance.

features.title: Remote Configuration
features.description: Adjust Sama Karangué app settings on smartphones remotely.

features.title: Cost Optimization
features.description: Analyze data to identify fuel savings opportunities.

items.title: Enhanced Safety
items.description: Ensure driver safety with SOS alerts and real-time tracking.

items.title: Quality of Service
items.description: Provide reliable proof of delivery and meet your deadlines.

items.title: Data-Driven Decisions
items.description: Access detailed analytics to identify trends and improve your processes.

finalCta.title: Ready to modernize your
finalCta.description: Join the companies that trust AI-Karangué for their mobile personnel management.

detailedFeatures.title: Safety & Emergency
detailedFeatures.description: Drivers alert you instantly in case of emergency via an SOS button.
detailedFeatures.posterText: La sécurité avant tout, vos livreurs vous alertent en cas d'urgence.

detailedFeatures.title: Assignment Optimization
detailedFeatures.description: Identify available drivers in real-time for better responsiveness.
detailedFeatures.posterText: Identifiez immédiatement les livreurs disponibles pour optimiser vos assignations.

detailedFeatures.title: Transparent Communication
detailedFeatures.description: Send your instructions without disruptive calls and keep a full history.
detailedFeatures.posterText: Transmettez vos instructions sans appels perturbants et conservez un historique.

detailedFeatures.title: Irrefutable Proof of Delivery
detailedFeatures.description: Each delivery is certified by a timestamped and geolocated scan.
detailedFeatures.posterText: Certifiez chaque livraison par un scan horodaté et géolocalisé pour une preuve de réception irréfutable.

detailedFeatures.title: Visual Quality Control
detailedFeatures.description: Receive visual proof of the state of packages to guarantee excellence.
detailedFeatures.posterText: Recevez des preuves visuelles de l'état des colis pour garantir l'excellence de votre service client.

detailedFeatures.title: Rigorous Traceability
detailedFeatures.description: Automate check-ins at key stages for flawless traceability.
detailedFeatures.posterText: Automatisez le pointage aux étapes clés pour une traçabilité rigoureuse de chaque chargement.

detailedFeatures.title: On-Demand Geolocation
detailedFeatures.description: Get exact GPS position at any time to reassure your customers.
detailedFeatures.posterText: Obtenez la position GPS exacte à la demande pour rassurer vos clients sur l'arrivée imminente.

detailedFeatures.title: Continuous Fleet Visibility
detailedFeatures.description: Unfalsifiable visibility on the activity of your entire delivery fleet.
detailedFeatures.posterText: Assurez-vous d'une visibilité continue et infalsifiable sur l'activité de toute votre flotte.
